alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 4:46AM PST until December 27 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Gusts up to 80 mph possible for the beaches and headlands. * WHERE...North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds will initially be confined to the beaches and headlands this evening, then are expected to spread into the coastal communities after midnight.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
